name: Potion Palette
description:
POTION PALETTE IS A FAST-PACED  GAME WHERE YOU PREPARE POTIONS TO PROTECT YOUR PARTY. 

Before taking on the terrifying tower, I'd suggest taking a gook look at YOUR COOKBOOK. It'll teach you how to CONCOCT THE POTIONS.

                                                                                  

To concoct potions CLICK ON THE RIGHT POTION BUTTONS TO MAKE THE RIGHT POTION. Then when you're ready , CLICK THE 'BREW' BUTTON AND PRESS THE 'SPACEBAR' AT THE RIGHT TIME to make the potion.

Then it's ready to serve up to your party member. Here's a picture of the cookbook potion. It might be a bit complicated at first but soon enough you'll be a master POTION-MAKER!

WARNING:

This was made for a game jam, so it might have some bugs, please let me know if you encounter any.

KNOWN BUGS:

The RESTART BUTTON DOESN'T WORK. You'll have to restart the game. I truly apologize. Luckily you can skip through the cutscene at the start.

Health bars might not make sense sometimes. I'll be honest, I have no idea how to fix it. It's a GODOT thing...

Sometimes if you give your party member a potion. they will stop attacking. If this happens., CLICK the PLAY BUTTON on the  TOP RIGHT SIDE, RIGHT BELOW THE 'KNIGHT HEALTHBAR BOX'. DO NOT CLICK IT IF THE BUG DOESN'T OCCUR! IT WILL BREAK YOUR GAME!

On that happy note, enjoy playing!
